info.title: Akkudoktor-EOS
info.description: This project provides a comprehensive solution for simulating and optimizing an energy system based on renewable energy sources. With a focus on photovoltaic (PV) systems, battery storage (batteries), load management (consumer requirements), heat pumps, electric vehicles, and consideration of electricity price data, this system enables forecasting and optimization of energy flow and costs over a specified period.

config_default_file_path.description: Compute the default config file path.

ConfigEOS.title: ConfigEOS
ConfigEOS.description:
Singleton configuration handler for the EOS application.

ConfigEOS extends `SettingsEOS` with support for  default configuration paths and automatic
initialization.

`ConfigEOS` ensures that only one instance of the class is created throughout the application,
allowing consistent access to EOS configuration settings. This singleton instance loads
configuration data from a predefined set of directories or creates a default configuration if
none is found.

Initialization Process:
  - Upon instantiation, the singleton instance attempts to load a configuration file in this order:
    1. The directory specified by the `EOS_DIR` environment variable.
    2. A platform specific default directory for EOS.
    3. The current working directory.
  - The first available configuration file found in these directories is loaded.
  - If no configuration file is found, a default configuration file is created in the platform
    specific default directory, and default settings are loaded into it.

Attributes from the loaded configuration are accessible directly as instance attributes of
`ConfigEOS`, providing a centralized, shared configuration object for EOS.

Singleton Behavior:
  - This class uses the `SingletonMixin` to ensure that all requests for `ConfigEOS` return
    the same instance, which contains the most up-to-date configuration. Modifying the configuration
    in one part of the application reflects across all references to this class.

Attributes:
    _settings (ClassVar[SettingsEOS]): Holds application-wide settings.
    _file_settings (ClassVar[SettingsEOS]): Stores configuration loaded from file.
    config_folder_path (Optional[Path]): Path to the configuration directory.
    config_file_path (Optional[Path]): Path to the configuration file.

Raises:
    FileNotFoundError: If no configuration file is found, and creating a default configuration fails.

Example:
    To initialize and access configuration attributes (only one instance is created):
    ```python
    config_eos = ConfigEOS()  # Always returns the same instance
    print(config_eos.prediction_hours)  # Access a setting from the loaded configuration
    ```

kapazitaet_wh.title: Kapazitaet Wh
kapazitaet_wh.description: An integer representing the capacity of the battery in watt-hours.

lade_effizienz.title: Lade Effizienz
lade_effizienz.description: A float representing the charging efficiency of the battery.

max_ladeleistung_w.title: Max Ladeleistung W
max_ladeleistung_w.description: An integer representing the charging power of the battery in watts.

start_soc_prozent.title: Start Soc Prozent
start_soc_prozent.description: An integer representing the current state of charge (SOC) of the battery in percentage.

min_soc_prozent.title: Min Soc Prozent
min_soc_prozent.description: An integer representing the minimum state of charge (SOC) of the battery in percentage.

charge_array.title: Charge Array
charge_array.description: Indicates for each hour whether the EV is charging (`0` for no charging, `1` for charging).

discharge_array.title: Discharge Array
discharge_array.description: Indicates for each hour whether the EV is discharging (`0` for no discharging, `1` for discharging).

entlade_effizienz.title: Entlade Effizienz
entlade_effizienz.description: The discharge efficiency as a float.

hours.title: Hours
hours.description: Amount of hours the simulation is done for.

kapazitaet_wh.title: Kapazitaet Wh
kapazitaet_wh.description: The capacity of the EV’s battery in watt-hours.

lade_effizienz.title: Lade Effizienz
lade_effizienz.description: The charging efficiency as a float.

max_ladeleistung_w.title: Max Ladeleistung W
max_ladeleistung_w.description: The maximum charging power of the EV in watts.

soc_wh.title: Soc Wh
soc_wh.description: The state of charge of the battery in watt-hours at the start of the simulation.

start_soc_prozent.title: Start Soc Prozent
start_soc_prozent.description: The state of charge of the battery in percentage at the start of the simulation.

EAutoResult.title: EAutoResult
EAutoResult.description: This object contains information related to the electric vehicle and its charging and discharging behavior.

pv_prognose_wh.title: Pv Prognose Wh
pv_prognose_wh.description: An array of floats representing the forecasted photovoltaic output in watts for different time intervals.

strompreis_euro_pro_wh.title: Strompreis Euro Pro Wh
strompreis_euro_pro_wh.description: An array of floats representing the electricity price in euros per watt-hour for different time intervals.

einspeiseverguetung_euro_pro_wh.title: Einspeiseverguetung Euro Pro Wh
einspeiseverguetung_euro_pro_wh.description: A float or array of floats representing the feed-in compensation in euros per watt-hour.

preis_euro_pro_wh_akku.title: Preis Euro Pro Wh Akku
preis_euro_pro_wh_akku.description: A float representing the cost of battery energy per watt-hour.

gesamtlast.title: Gesamtlast
gesamtlast.description: An array of floats representing the total load (consumption) in watts for different time intervals.

consumption_wh.title: Consumption Wh
consumption_wh.description: An integer representing the energy consumption of a household device in watt-hours.

duration_h.title: Duration H
duration_h.description: An integer representing the usage duration of a household device in hours.

temperature_forecast.title: Temperature Forecast
temperature_forecast.description: An array of floats representing the temperature forecast in degrees Celsius for different time intervals.

start_solution.title: Start Solution
start_solution.description: Can be `null` or contain a previous solution (if available).

ac_charge.title: Ac Charge
ac_charge.description: Array with AC charging values as relative power (0-1), other values set to 0.

dc_charge.title: Dc Charge
dc_charge.description: Array with DC charging values as relative power (0-1), other values set to 0.

discharge_allowed.title: Discharge Allowed
discharge_allowed.description: Array with discharge values (1 for discharge, 0 otherwise).

start_solution.title: Start Solution
start_solution.description: An array of binary values (0 or 1) representing a possible starting solution for the simulation.

washingstart.title: Washingstart
washingstart.description: Can be `null` or contain an object representing the start of washing (if applicable).

OptimizeResponse.title: OptimizeResponse
OptimizeResponse.description: **Note**: The first value of "Last_Wh_pro_Stunde", "Netzeinspeisung_Wh_pro_Stunde" and "Netzbezug_Wh_pro_Stunde", will be set to null in the JSON output and represented as NaN or None in the corresponding classes' data returns. This approach is adopted to ensure that the current hour's processing remains unchanged.

kapazitaet_wh.title: Kapazitaet Wh
kapazitaet_wh.description: An integer representing the capacity of the battery in watt-hours.

lade_effizienz.title: Lade Effizienz
lade_effizienz.description: A float representing the charging efficiency of the battery.

max_ladeleistung_w.title: Max Ladeleistung W
max_ladeleistung_w.description: An integer representing the charging power of the battery in watts.

start_soc_prozent.title: Start Soc Prozent
start_soc_prozent.description: An integer representing the state of charge of the battery at the **start** of the current hour (not the current state).

min_soc_prozent.title: Min Soc Prozent
min_soc_prozent.description: An integer representing the minimum state of charge (SOC) of the battery in percentage.

weatherimport_file_path.title: Weatherimport File Path
weatherimport_file_path.description: Path to the file to import weather data from.

weatherimport_json.title: Weatherimport Json
weatherimport_json.description: JSON string, dictionary of weather forecast value lists.

weather_provider.title: Weather Provider
weather_provider.description: Weather provider id of provider to be used.

pvforecastimport_file_path.title: Pvforecastimport File Path
pvforecastimport_file_path.description: Path to the file to import pvforecast data from.

pvforecastimport_json.title: Pvforecastimport Json
pvforecastimport_json.description: JSON string, dictionary of PV forecast float value lists.Keys are 'pvforecast_dc_power', 'pvforecast_ac_power'.

pvforecast_provider.title: Pvforecast Provider
pvforecast_provider.description: PVForecast provider id of provider to be used.

pvforecast0_surface_tilt.description: Tilt angle from horizontal plane. Ignored for two-axis tracking.

pvforecast0_surface_azimuth.description: Orientation (azimuth angle) of the (fixed) plane. Clockwise from north (north=0, east=90, south=180, west=270).

pvforecast0_userhorizon.title: Pvforecast0 Userhorizon
pvforecast0_userhorizon.description: Elevation of horizon in degrees, at equally spaced azimuth clockwise from north.

pvforecast0_peakpower.title: Pvforecast0 Peakpower
pvforecast0_peakpower.description: Nominal power of PV system in kW.

pvforecast0_mountingplace.description: Type of mounting for PV system. Options are 'free' for free-standing and 'building' for building-integrated.

Einnahmen_Euro_pro_Stunde.title: Einnahmen Euro Pro Stunde

Gesamtbilanz_Euro.title: Gesamtbilanz Euro

SimulationResult.title: SimulationResult
SimulationResult.description: This object contains the results of the simulation and provides insights into various parameters over the entire forecast period.
